description:
To return Prince Chris to his former self, Vivi uses her cards of fortune.  The cards end up showing Vivi`s mistress, the Keeper of the Jewels. Thinking the Ultimate Shine is at her mistress`, she returns to the house and, just as the fortune says, finds a card that is shining.  Vivi returns to the human world and heads straight for Chris.  However, the card she is holding suddenly glows and flies away saying "Liar, liar."  What Vivi was actually holding was the Liar Liar card which forces whatever it is attached to to lie. Vivi chases after the card to catch it, but the card runs through the entire town forcing people to tell lies. Finally, it attaches itself to Natsuki, who hates lies...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oh No! Trouble With the Magic Card Pri!
魔法カードで Oh!たいへん☆ぷりっ!
